name: Accounting Mayhem
description:
This game was created for the Unreal spring Jam 2020 which lasted over 5 days.

The theme was "What is hiding in the snow is revealed with the thaw"

This is a physics based management game where you play the role of an Accountant in the 90s. Your mission is to order a list of items given to you from your boss. As you order in items you start to get a lot of extra stuff that just came with the order. It is key that you hide away these items in your office so that your boss does not discover that you have wasted company money.

!!Observe!!

Due to a game breaking bug that appeared after the jam (Boss don't appear to check your office - which makes it impossible to finish the game), we had to upload a new version to Google drive since the uploads for itch are disabled due to voting.

New build with a fix to the game breaking bug down below:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/13R7eDx8qGwtJfwAfBQeXIJGYZtE3o2p1/view?usp=shari...
